channel.description: Recent content in Devex on mrnice.dev

item.title: DevProd Adventure
item.description: Context This is a presentation I gave at Angular Ventures in 2024. It’s about the new-ish and emerging concept of Developer Experience, and what I’ve learned about it over the last year of doing it. It’s a Reveal.js presentation, so you can view it in your browser on Desktop only. Use the arrow keys and Esc to navigate, and press s to see the speaker notes. Presentation Developer Experience The adventure begins.
